```pddl
[
    '(:action fold
        :parameters (?entity - object)
        :precondition (and (not (completely-folded ?entity)))
        :effect (and (completely-folded ?entity)
                     (not (completely-folded ?entity)))',
                     
    '(:action store
        :parameters (?item - object ?location - place)
        :precondition (and (prepared ?item) (storage_area ?location))
        :effect (and (stored ?item ?location)
                     (not (prepared ?item)))',
                     
    '(:action hang
        :parameters (?item - object ?destination - place ?intermediate - place)
        :precondition (and (stored ?item ?intermediate) (suitable ?destination))
        :effect (and (hung ?item ?destination)
                     (not (stored ?item ?intermediate)))'
]
```
